message.body: Do you have a Dropbox account? I have a bunch of free acu stuff from my new friend!
No. Should i? Is it free? Ez?
Yes! Both easy and free (tho if you want a bunch more space you have to pay) but its great to share big files.
Ty for email. Intrigued by the Luos
I have entire PDFs of books on there! I can spare you the boards study guides. Lol Want me to send an invite? We both get extra space that way.
Ur generosity is appreciated Hope schools going well for u
Yes!!!! I don't know about the Luos but want to!

Sure invite me. Esp if it gets u more space. May not get to it til next week tho We barely scratched luo pts at the won. I think few professors use or understand them in that way. They'll use st40 for phlegm and lu7 but few others
Get back to your party
"Especially if it helps you" ☺ Thanks Bob, you're as generous as I am!
Yeah I don't think Luos are talked about enough.
My party is trying to figure out what Janet thinks a great point on the abdomen for constipation is. I'm guessing cv 12??
Could be. But st25 is good too.
LI mu
if due to food stagnation w yucky foul breath cv10
Another strategy is to palate abdomen and possibly find hard mass - stuck shit
Palpate not palate
I love celestial pivot/st 25, one of my favorite points! Especially since I am a colon cf.
there ya go!
So ya think that's the point she's looking for?
I combine st25 w three kings LI 4.11, Th6
Eew palpating for shit masses. A classmate found one in me once and was like wtf is that thing that's so moveable. Janice came over and identified it for us.
Cv12 too
Lol
What do you do with poop masses? A classmate offered to try to move it and I was like dude leave it alone!!!
Lol. U can do that or just needle around it. Can recommend patient massage it along. Fris was good at massaging it along and I honk it kind of broke it up along te way.
Steve taught us to speed cup in a circle. Guaranteed bowel movement within 6 hrs or something like that
does master seung ever have u massage belly clockwise before or after meditation?
I think that's to promote healthy digestion
goes w flow of LI
Yes that's a good idea--belly rub in a circle.
Perhaps ?
Cupping too tho I had a terrible gross poop after I got belly cupping. Could it move stuff too fast?
I have to admit manually moving shit through massage is terrifyingly disgusting to me.
But u know how crappy (pun intended) constipation can be. Also feeling like they are doing something , not helpless, can be impt/helpful for some
Massage LI4 instead ?
Self massage sounds great to me as homework.

Do you think LI 4 would do it? I was just reading deadman about how there are no LI points for constipation because the channel doesn't hit the lower jiao actually. Which I thought was interesting/weird.
I am so glad to have you to talk to!
Li4 is also known as the great eliminator
Oh yeah the great eliminator I forgot that
Channel starts in ST right?
Eliminates stools headaches (in front of ears i think) and babies
Do you have other acupuncturists/colleagues you talk to about this stuff? Is it lonely after school is done?
Haha babies
Will chat a little w billy. Sarah loves talking treatment strategies. But usually I'm a need all by myself
The profession is pretty solitary
Not sure is call it lonely but solitary. I'm a freak. Don't really get lonely per se. I do know that when I study on my own its pretty frequent that it comes up in clinic and it pays dividends
I love Billy! Have you met Cara Jo? She's awesome too!!
I met her but nothing close to a real conversation. Seems nice. I like billy a lot too.
my first day in clinic he offered to come hang out and just be around in case I needed anything
but sometimes when I am studying I am just processing and not ready to talk about it yet lol
Yes I want to study more always! I like having people to bounce ideas off of.
Texting in the middle of the night about poop masses
Aw Billy. I just adore him. What a beautiful heart he has!!!
We both know stuff. And most importantly know there is more to know
True. I often talk out loud to myself teaching myself and have note cards I study/review on way to work
You know who to text when you get the urge! I am catching up to you info wise but not treatment wise yet!
I find that being able to teach it to someone is a deeper level of understanding for me. But I love soaking stuff in too.
I feel less like a baby all the time. Tho I still feel like I am a baby in terms of clinical skills. A cute baby fawn hopefully.
there ya go!
and when u feel u are starting to get a hang of things hang on to the humility. Don't get full of yourself pls
Wait a minute. Should I fear for your safety driving with notecards?! I can be kind of a safety nerd with traffic. I am a terrible driver.
Not really sentences just condition on one side and pts on other. Held on steering wheel. Ez to read. Barely look at. But I try to be safe. Ty for reminding me
And caring
Pls text me when u r on road so I know to get off
My SECOND (long story) drivers Ed teacher yelled: I don't know what's wrong with you. You just start daydreaming or something!
Lmao
Oh my. Second? Heehee
It would be pretty hard for me to get full of myself but I will gladly accept that reminder. ☺
Second only because we moved from OH to NC and I think I only had a learners permit? I didn't have to repeat it but felt more comfortable doing so. Not so scandalous really.
I am actually excellent on scary twisty back roads but the speed of highways does something bad to my nervous system.
Oh I thought the first one quit for his own safety
My car Jerome "died" in 2006 so nothing to drive anyways. Jerome was cute. He looked like this:
Cute
Gn. have great weekend
Goodnight!
You too.
